title: Fragrant pilau rice
description: An essential part of a homemade curry feast,  pilau rice uses just a few store cupboard spices for authentic flavour.
ingredients: 450g/1lb basmati rice (for a more authentic flavour and texture it is best not to use easy-cook rice; however, it will still work and be very tasty if you do)
large knob butter, plus extra to serve
600ml/1 pint hot chicken stock, vegetable stock or water
